english.segment1: God has given me a window, and. I can finally see the light. And though I felt like going. under, I know it's gonna be alright
english.segment2: You know that I've been there. When I couldn't find an open door. That's when He consoled me. And showed me what I was looking for. I just want to take the time to say. His love will never go away. And when all is dark no light to see, He brings a way. Oh my God has..
english.segment3: I know what you're thinking. It seems that it is too good to be true. Cause just when I need Him. He's known for always coming through. I just want to take the time to say. His love will never go away. And when all is dark, no light to see, He brings a way
english.segment4: It's gonna be alright, it's gonna all work out fine. No matter where you are in life, He is able
english.segment5: Oh I've found and I believe. That it's true, it's true indeed. No matter what you're going through. God has a window for you
